Sodium Scorpio's Black and Grey Bartender Shirt

Schwarz und graues Sodium-Scorpio's Barkeeper-Hemd
Camicia da barista dello Scorpio's di Sodium nera e grigia

Sodium Scorpio's Black and Grey Bartender Shirt
kDesc
Wear this item with the Black and Grey Bartender Trousers whilst working in Scorpio’s Bar to earn Sodium credits. [#Legal]
Portez cette chemise avec le pantalon noir et gris de barman pour servir au bar Scorpio’s afin de gagner des crédits Sodium. [#Legal]
Trage diesen Artikel mit den schwarz und grauen Barkeeper-Hosen, wenn du in Scorpio's Bar arbeitest, um Sodium-Credits zu verdienen. [#Legal]
Indossa questo articolo insieme ai pantaloni da barista neri e grigi mentre lavori al Bar Scorpio's per guadagnare Crediti Sodium. [#Legal]
Combínala con los pantalones de camarero negros y grises mientras trabajas en Scorpio's para conseguir créditos Sodium. [#Legal]
Scorpio's のバーで働いて Sodiumクレジットを稼ぐ際、このアイテムを着用しよう。 [#Legal]
이 셔츠를 흑/회색 바텐더 긴바지와 함께 입고 Scorpio's 바에서 일하면 Sodium 포인트를 적립할 수 있습니다. [#Legal]
Wear this item with the Black and Grey Bartender Trousers whilst working in Scorpio’s Bar to earn Sodium credits. [#Legal]
在 Scorpio's 酒吧工作時穿著本制服及灰黑色調酒師長褲，可賺取Sodium積分。[#Legal]
在 Scorpio's 酒吧工作時穿著本制服及灰黑色調酒師長褲，可賺取Sodium積分。[#Legal]
Wear this item with the Black and Grey Bartender Trousers whilst working in Scorpio’s Bar to earn Sodium credits. [#Legal]
